entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
